purpose: Complete execution prompt for the next agent to implement the AI-Q Knowledge Library System migration in autopilot mode, with comprehensive error checking and validation.

mandatory_elements: Commitment to error checking and validation
agent_introduction.introduction_template:
"Hello! I'm [AGENT_NAME], [MODEL_VERSION], specializing in [SPECIALIZATION]. I'm taking over the AI-Q Knowledge Library System 
migration project as [CURRENT_ROLE]. My mission is to execute the complete migration implementation 
in autopilot mode, ensuring zero technical debt and production-only testing.

I acknowledge the work of the previous agent and will thoroughly 
review and validate all existing work before proceeding. I will document all my 
actions and include my agent identification in all files I create or modify.

Session started: [TIMESTAMP]"
agent_introduction.introduction_requirement: MANDATORY: This introduction must be included in the first message of every agent session

previous_agent_errors: Assume the previous agent made errors that need correction
Double-check all existing work for issues and inconsistencies
Verify all standards compliance and policy adherence
Identify and fix any technical debt or violations
quality_standards: Zero technical debt: no TODOs, temporary code, or manual steps
All tests must use production data, services, and servers
All documentation must be in YAML/JSON format (no markdown)
All code must be production-ready and fully tested
All changes must be versioned, immutable, and peer-reviewed

current_state.status: Standards and blueprints created, ready for implementation

objectives: Implement complete AI-Q Knowledge Library System
Migrate all existing content to new system
Enable AI-powered content organization and retrieval

step_1.action: Review and validate all existing work
step_1.description: Thoroughly examine all files and configurations for errors
validation: Check all YAML files for syntax errors
Identify any missing or incomplete content
documentation: Document any errors or inconsistencies found
List all files that need correction

step_2.description: Ensure all required tools and environments are available
validation: Confirm all required tools are installed
documentation: Create environment setup guide if needed

step_4.description: Build the core AI-Q Knowledge Library System
validation: All tests passing with production data

step_5.description: Migrate all existing content to new system
commands: Analyze all existing content in griot-main-win11
Convert markdown to YAML where appropriate

step_6.description: Execute all tests using production data and services
commands: Run all unit tests with production data

detection: Automated error detection in all processes
recovery: Root cause analysis for all issues
validation: Validate against all standards and policies

agent_identification: Include agent name and model in all files created
Add creation timestamp to all documents
Maintain audit trail of all changes

file_headers.template:
# [Document Title]
---
version: "[VERSION]"
last_updated: "[TIMESTAMP]"
created_by: "[AGENT_NAME] - [MODEL_VERSION]"
purpose: >
  [Document purpose and description]

technical: All tests using production data and services
operational: All backup and recovery procedures tested

conclusion:
This prompt provides complete guidance for implementing the AI-Q Knowledge Library System migration in autopilot mode. The agent must follow all instructions exactly, maintain zero technical debt, use production-only testing, and document all actions thoroughly.
Success requires strict adherence to all policies, comprehensive error checking, and complete documentation of all work performed.
